template = """text
    <%
        print("hi")
        for x in range(1,5):
            print(x)
    %>
more text
    <%!
        import foo
    %>
"""
nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Text('text\n    ', (1, 1)), Code(
    """
print("hi")
for x in range(1,5):
    print(x)
    
""", False, (2, 
    5)), Text('\nmore text\n    ', (6, 7)), Code("""
import foo
    
""", 
    True, (8, 5)), Text('\n', (10, 7))]))
